title: Person of Interest - Dog scene
author: Csaba Budai
comment: Bear is a great character.  I'm glad he decided to adopt Reese (and now Shaw).

"Foei" = saying that what is doing is bad, in this video its about this dog barking
"Stil" = saying to him to be silent
"Afligen" = to lay down
Yes its dutch...and we speak "dutch" in Belgium.
The stunt-man who went through the window really deserves some recognition.  That was one hell of a drop.  Minor continuity issue with the scene change.

Another favorite scene with bear is when they're trapped at the pool and have to blow a hole in the bottom of the pool to access the tunnel underneath. And when the woman asks, "What about the dog?" Reece says, "He's scuba certified." He whistles and Bear leaps into the water. 🤗

The most badass scene in all of television﻿ and movie history. I knew that as soon as I watched it! And who cares about the language, whether it's actually Dutch or not the point of this video is to show the most badass scene ever! :D
description: Funny scene with a military dog... :)
